text: Farshetswotsnat farshats beedk'tswotsi bek'on t bek'tso hank'oyi, bogeratse teshts t'ururiyo tawk'ak'ok'o bíra, darimaac'ok'o aak'a, ac'uwok'owere arka b́tesh, farshwots tookonúwere eeshi took arka b́tesh, bo nonotse tawonat s'uwonú diniyo9:17 Ainiya: Eto bíaat'or keetsi shok'ok'o shook'f kaashk'on aat'ef, aat'iru shútsi laluwa.  b́keshfere b́tesh,
